definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column
variant of 為|为[wei4], because of/for/to
variant of 為|为[wei2]/as (i.e. in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do
as (in the capacity of)/to take sth as/to act as/to serve as/to behave as/to become/to be/to do/by (in the passive voice)

sentences.english: Offenses with this characteristic usually will be encountered as assimilative crimes.
sentences.chinese: 带有此特征的犯罪行为通常将视为同等犯罪。

sentences.english: Fourth, the failure is beyond the unit's will.
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为未达既遂是由于单位意志以外的原因。

sentences.english: It is a crime to counterfeit money.
All in all, loan sharking is a offense.
sentences.chinese: 总之，放高利贷是一种犯罪行为。

sentences.english: Criminal behavior by adolescents and children.
sentences.chinese: 少年和儿童的犯罪行为。

sentences.english: We needed to know whether the crime had been premeditated.
sentences.chinese: 我们需要知道的是这一犯罪行为是否经过事先策划过。

sentences.english: Being short of inculpation legalizes the criminal offence of secret policemen in criminal investigation.
sentences.chinese: 卧底警察在侦查中的犯罪行为合法化，不具有可罚性。

sentences.english: Are the seeds of criminal behavior sown early in life ?
sentences.chinese: 犯罪行为的根源是否始自幼时？

sentences.english: The origin of the abnormal psychology crime is that the crime actor's spirit is unusual.
sentences.chinese: 变态心理犯罪的根源是犯罪行为人的精神异常。

sentences.english: Kill a man to warn a hundred is a necessary way to reduce crimes.
sentences.chinese: 杀一儆百是减少犯罪行为的必要手段。

sentences.english: We have laws that criminalize homosexuality. We have laws that criminalize drug use.
sentences.chinese: 我们的法律将同性恋和吸毒定为犯罪行为。

sentences.english: The police and the people join to combat crime.
sentences.chinese: 警方与群众联手与犯罪行为做斗争。

sentences.english: To build a society we must punish each other for crimes.
sentences.chinese: 为了建设社会，我们必须相互惩罚各自的犯罪行为。

sentences.english: Xinhua described the gift as 'an act of remorse' from Li for associating China's ubiquitous animal with his criminal activity.
sentences.chinese: 新华社称该捐赠是李俊对自己将犯罪行为的悔过自新。

sentences.english: The problem of delinquency is increasingly more serious in this area.
sentences.chinese: 在这些地区，青少年犯罪行为正变得日益严重。

definition: to repeatedly commit an offense/repeat offender/habitual criminal/recidivist/recidivism
actual sin (Christian notion, as opposed to original sin 原罪)
